statements: SELECT * FROM AnomalyDetection;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_count FROM AnomalyDetection;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE activity_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_count FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE activity_type = 'login' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM AnomalyDetection ORDER BY user_id DESC, activity_timestamp ASC, activity_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM AnomalyDetection GROUP BY user_id, activity_type HAVING total_activities > 3
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM AnomalyDetection ORDER BY activity_type
SELECT user_id, SUM(activity_count) AS total_activity_count FROM AnomalyDetection GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activity_count DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_timestamp) AS latest_activity_timestamp FROM AnomalyDetection GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_count FROM user_activity WHERE activity_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection ORDER BY anomaly_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, activity_count FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_count > 10 ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type, anomaly_date FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'critical' ORDER BY anomaly_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(activity_count) AS total_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activity > 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(anomaly_id) AS total_anomalies FROM anomaly_detection GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_anomalies > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(activity_count) FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_count) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type='Suspicious' ORDER BY anomaly_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, activity_count FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_count FROM user_activity WHERE activity_count > 100 AND activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection JOIN anomaly_details ON anomaly_detection.anomaly_id = anomaly_details.anomaly_id WHERE anomaly_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type LIKE '%spam%' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_anomalies >= 3 ORDER BY total_anomalies DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT login_id, login_timestamp, login_location, login_success FROM login_activity ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM login_activity WHERE login_location = 'New York' AND login_success = TRUE ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM activity_logs ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, SUM(anomaly_score) AS total_anomaly_score FROM anomaly_detection GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_anomaly_score > 10

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, a.activity_type, a.activity_timestamp FROM users u INNER JOIN activity_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.activity_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY a.activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, activity_date, activity_type, activity_count FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_score FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_category = 'Low Risk';
SELECT detection_date, anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM AnomalyDetection ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM AnomalyLog WHERE detection_id = 3 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, detection_id, anomaly_score, anomaly_status FROM UserAnomaly WHERE anomaly_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_score FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_category = 'Engagement' ORDER BY behavior_score ASC;
SELECT detection_id, anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE DATE(detection_date) = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM AnomalyLog WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-05-15' AND '2022-06-15' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT ua.user_id, ad.anomaly_type, ua.anomaly_score FROM UserAnomaly ua JOIN AnomalyDetection ad ON ua.detection_id = ad.detection_id WHERE ua.anomaly_status = 'Pending';
